item.title: How to use the PDF Viewer, to view PDF's in a Model Driven app from an attachment column

item.title: Setting conditions on the visible property - Canvas App
item.description:
Setting conditions on the visible property - Canvas App

How can I hide my items/control based on conditions?

You can of course use an IF statement, or Switch, and work from there.

True - shows the item False - hides the item

But how can I do this dynamically?

You can use Environment Variables. These can be changed when you move between environments (for ALM purposes) Set an environment variable in your solution, add the desired persons email address(es) and refresh your datasources in the Canvas app.
